source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a low-angle shot of the vibrant green Aurora Borealis in the night sky. The view is framed by the silhouettes of tall evergreen and bare trees in a snowy, forested landscape. The video captures the dynamic display of the northern lights.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a low-angle shot of the vibrant green Aurora Borealis in the night sky. The view is framed by the silhouettes of tall evergreen and bare trees in a snowy, forested landscape. The video captures the dynamic display of the northern lights.

bad_caption: A flock of white swans glides across a calm lake at sunset. The camera pans upward as the birds take off in unison, flying over a field of blooming sunflowers. The video follows their flight as they disappear into the orange and pink sky.
